deepedebugWallFileName - Static variable in class generation.Cells
 
DefaultViewer - Class in falstad
This is a default implementation of the Viewer interface with methods that do nothing but providing debugging output such that subclasses of this class can selectively overwrite those methods that are truly needed.
DefaultViewer() - Constructor for class falstad.DefaultViewer
 
deleteWall(Wall) - Method in class generation.Cells
Delete a wall between to adjacent cells (x,y) and (x+dx,y+dy).
